articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: Covishield may not be eligible for ‘vaccine passport’ by the EU - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The European Union had earlier said that member states can issue the certificates regardless of the type of Covid-19 vaccine, but the technical specifications indicate that the pass will be limited to “vaccines that have received EU-wide marketing authorizati…
articles.content: Travellers vaccinated with Covishield, the AstraZeneca-Oxford vaccine manufactured in India, may not be eligible for the European Unions Green Pass an immunity document that is meant to ease travel w… [+2155 chars]
